params.query:
SELECT 
    uid,
    COUNT(*) AS message_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10)) AS active_days,
    SUBSTR(MIN(created_at), 1, 10) AS first_active_date,
    SUBSTR(MAX(created_at), 1, 10) AS last_active_date
FROM message
GROUP BY uid
